title: `move` from B2 using --b2-download-url to local, result in 2 deletion attempts and a lot of error logs
body:
### error messages

in the 1st attempt, it fails with `ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: failed to delete "9091-0.jpg": Bad file ID:  (400 bad_request)` log messages for each file, the 2nd succeeds

I modified bucket name and b2 proxy url, uploaded 1 file to reproduce without too much noise. Adding `--b2-hard-delete` or not results in the same.

```log
‚ûú  ~ rclone move arandombucket: ./images/ --progress --transfers 20 --checkers 20 --b2-download-url https://arandom-bucket-proxy.ahxxm.workers.dev -vv
2024/10/03 08:22:19 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.68.1" starting with parameters ["rclone" "move" "arandombucket:" "./images/" "--progress" "--transfers" "20" "--checkers" "20" "--b2-download-url" "https://arandom-bucket-proxy.ahxxm.workers.dev" "-vv"]
2024/10/03 08:22:19 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "arandombucket:"
2024/10/03 08:22:19 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/debian/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2024/10/03 08:22:19 DEBUG : arandombucket: detected overridden config - adding "{8uF0U}" suffix to name
2024/10/03 08:22:20 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "arandombucket:" to be canonical "arandombucket{8uF0U}:"
2024/10/03 08:22:20 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "./images/"
2024/10/03 08:22:20 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "./images/" to be canonical "/home/debian/images"
2024/10/03 08:22:20 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Need to transfer - File not found at Destination
2024/10/03 08:22:20 DEBUG : Local file system at /home/debian/images: Waiting for checks to finish
2024/10/03 08:22:20 DEBUG : Local file system at /home/debian/images: Waiting for transfers to finish
2024/10/03 08:22:21 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Bad X-Bz-Upload-Timestamp header: strconv.ParseInt: parsing "": invalid syntax
2024/10/03 08:22:21 DEBUG : preAllocate: got error on fallocate, trying combination 1/2: operation not supported
2024/10/03 08:22:21 DEBUG : preAllocate: got error on fallocate, trying combination 2/2: operation not supported
2024/10/03 08:22:22 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Bad X-Bz-Upload-Timestamp header: strconv.ParseInt: parsing "": invalid syntax
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Bad X-Bz-Upload-Timestamp header: strconv.ParseInt: parsing "": invalid syntax
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Src hash empty - aborting Dst hash check
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg.b3c5fdc0.partial: renamed to: arandombucket/9091-0.jpg
2024/10/03 08:22:23 INFO  : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Copied (new)
2024/10/03 08:22:23 ERROR : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Couldn't delete: failed to delete "9091-0.jpg": Bad file ID:  (400 bad_request)
2024/10/03 08:22:23 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: failed to delete "9091-0.jpg": Bad file ID:  (400 bad_request)
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Modification times differ by 44.8719064s: 2024-10-02 23:21:37.453 +0000 UTC, 2024-10-03 08:22:22.3249064 +0900 JST
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : Local file system at /home/debian/images: Waiting for checks to finish
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: sha1 = 5483bb1ef22f5f2357db25ae561abf08dda62fbe OK
2024/10/03 08:22:23 INFO  : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Updated modification time in destination
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Unchanged skipping
2024/10/03 08:22:23 INFO  : arandombucket/9091-0.jpg: Deleted
2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : Local file system at /home/debian/images: Waiting for transfers to finish
2024/10/03 08:22:23 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 succeeded
Transferred:        2.903 MiB / 2.903 MiB, 100%, 1.451 MiB/s, ETA 0s
Checks:                 3 / 3, 100%
Deleted:                2 (files), 0 (dirs), 5.806 MiB (freed)
Transferred:            1 / 1, 100%
Elapsed time:         3.6s
2024/10/03 08:22:23 INFO  :
Transferred:        2.903 MiB / 2.903 MiB, 100%, 1.451 MiB/s, ETA 0s
Checks:                 3 / 3, 100%
Deleted:                2 (files), 0 (dirs), 5.806 MiB (freed)
Transferred:            1 / 1, 100%
Elapsed time:         3.6s

2024/10/03 08:22:23 DEBUG : 11 go routines active
```

### Version

v1.68.1 freshly selfupdated, Gentoo in WSL, static build

```
rclone v1.68.1
- os/version: gentoo 2.15 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 5.15.153.1-microsoft-standard-WSL2 (x86_64)
- os/type: linux
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.23.1
- go/linking: static
- go/tags: none
```

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
